title: Behance Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from Behance by keyword, location, and job type. This actor is API-first (fast + low cost) and fetches listing and detail data from Behance JSON endpoints.

startUrls.title: Search via URLs (Optional)
startUrls.description: Optional. Provide Behance job URLs (/joblist/<id>/...), listing URLs (/joblist?page=...), API endpoints (/v2/jobs?...), or sitemap XML files. These URLs are crawled first (and can replace the keyword search).

keyword.title: Search Keyword
keyword.description: Job title or keyword to search for (e.g., 'Graphic Designer', 'UX Designer', 'Illustrator', 'Creative Director').

location.title: Location
location.description: Filter jobs by location (e.g., 'New York', 'San Francisco', 'Remote', 'London').

collectDetails.title: Scrape Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Enable to visit each job page and extract complete descriptions. Disable for faster scraping with basic info only.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to scrape. Set higher for comprehensive data collection.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages to Scrape
max_pages.description: Limit the number of listing pages to process (safety cap to prevent excessive requests).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for requests. Residential proxies recommended for Behance to avoid rate limiting.
